title: Person of Interest || Fallout Style
author: Real Scorsese
comment: Beautifully done!  Makes me miss this wonderful show even more!  Thank you for creating this.......I hope you'll do more & help keep this fandom alive.
Your videos are so great. Thank you so much for the memories, I miss this show more than I can say.
I only see it now but great job my friend, I used to watch this show on TV and to see a great edit for Person of Interest, just perfect!! :D
your videos are always so good - I like how you work with the quotes
description:
Here is a video that I prepared. The POI editing is finally here, I put a lot of time on it, and having it done with Mission Impossible Fallout was so exciting, can you share it ? 

Montage: Thibault Wcislo (MFBA)
Song: Mission impossible Fallout Trailer 
Software : Sony Vegas Pro 14
